item.description:
"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE & ACTIVITIES ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

SATURDAY, JANUARY 29 , HOLIDAY INN HOTEL, 1 Newbury St., Rte. 1 north, Peabody, 978-535-4600
www.se-4u.com
Terrific dance music by Award-winning DJ, 8:30-12:00.
For singles and couples 35-65 years old.
FREE SALSA DANCE LESSONS FROM 7:30-8:30.
Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvres 9-10. Generous door prizes, raffle, and MATCHING game with additional prizes.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women.
Cost is $13.
Co-Sponsored by the Young Professionals Club of Boston.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Dennis at the door.
item.name: NEW~~ "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
